showFPS - Static variable in class net.gliblybits.bitsengine.core.BitsApp

If set to 'true' the app will render the frame rate in the upper left corner
of the screen.

call this method with the corresponding screen id.
SLEEP_MODE_DIM - Static variable in class net.gliblybits.bitsengine.core.BitsApp
App will allow to dim the screen, but not to turn it off.
SLEEP_MODE_OFF - Static variable in class net.gliblybits.bitsengine.core.BitsApp
App will keep the screen on.
SLEEP_MODE_ON - Static variable in class net.gliblybits.bitsengine.core.BitsApp
App will allow to dim and turn of the display.
